title: 1BR/1BA APT. W/ STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES IN A PET-FRIENDLY COMMUNITY
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Colonnade Apartments!', 'One Bedroom  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 700 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,605 - $2,908', '* Unit 413 - Available Now', '* Unit 624 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 601 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 701 - Available Now', '* Unit 506 - Available', 'Now', 'The Colonnade Apartments', 'Address:', '201 S 4th Street San Jose, CA 95112', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x215', 'Property Description', 'This one-bedroom, one-bathroom floor plan from The Colonnade Apartments is available for lease today.', 'This model has textured rugs in the bedroom and stainless steel appliances and quartz counters in the kitchen.', 'A hot tub, a sauna, and a swimming pool are among the available amenities at this pet-friendly community.', 'Drop by the community today to see more.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Features', '* Mountain view', 'Property Amenities', '* Dry sauna', '* Indoor jacuzzi/whirlpool', '* Regular-sized pool', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* ClubHouse', '* Laundry', '* A/C - Window/Wall unit(s)', '* Covered parking for most cars', '* Controlled building access', '* Elevator', 'Parking:', 'Please contact our office regarding parking details.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We accept 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fees range from $55 to $80 per pet.', 'There is a weight limit of 50 lbs.', 'Please contact our leasing office for pet policies and breed restrictions.', 'Units:', '221', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x215', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
